text: Avihai (, lit. My father lives), sometimes spelled Avichai, is a Hebrew name generally found in Israel. It may refer to: ==People== * Avichai Mandelblit (1963–), an Israeli jurist * Avichai Rontzki (1951–2018), an Israeli rabbi * Avihai Yadin (1986–), an Israeli footballer ==Fictional characters== * Avihai, a character in Fauda
title: Avihai
